alert.note: Alert for Clarke (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 18 at 8:10PM CDT until June 21 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tallahala Creek At Laurel affecting Jones County. Chickasawhay River At Enterprise affecting Clarke County. For the Pascagoula...including Collins, Near Hattiesburg, Hattiesburg, Laurel, Chunky, Arundel, Enterprise, Shubuta, Brooklyn...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING TO WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chickasawhay River At Enterprise. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening to Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Water beginning to overflow banks from the confluence of Chunky River and Okatibbee Creek to approximately 3 miles downstream. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 18.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 25.0 feet Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Chickasawhay River Enterprise 25.0 18.6 Sun 7 pm CDT 20.8 25.0 23.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 930 AM CDT.
